pre;">	</span><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"> â†’ DÃ©tail d'une commande&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">POST /api/orders <span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span> â†’ CrÃ©er une commande&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">PUT /api/orders/:id <span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span> <span style="white-space: pre;">	</span> â†’ Modifier le statut&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">DELETE /api/orders/:id <span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span> â†’ Supprimer une commande&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">GET /api/health <span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span> â†’ VÃ©rifier l'Ã©tat du serveur&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">POST /api/admin/sync <span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span> â†’ Forcer la synchronisation&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><br></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">ResponsabilitÃ©s:&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span </mxCell> <UserObject label="<div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;Tables:&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;Orders (Commandes)&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ OrderId (PK, INT, AUTO_INCREMENT)&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ SalesforceId (UNIQUE, NVARCHAR(50)) â† CRITIQUE!&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ Amount (DECIMAL(10,2))<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ Status (NVARCHAR(50))&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ CreatedAt (DATETIME)&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ LastSyncedAt (DATETIME)&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><br></div><div style="text-align: justify;">ğŸ‘¤ Clients (Pour extension future)&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ ClientId (PK)&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ Email, Nom, PrÃ©nom&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><br></div><div style="text-align: justify;">ğŸ“§ Notifications (Pour extension future)&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ NotificationId (PK)</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ OrderId (FK)&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ Type (Email/SMS)&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ SentAt (DATETIME)</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><br></span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Indexes Critiques:&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>âœ“ IX_SalesforceId (pour sync rapide)&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>âœ“ IX_OrderNumber (pour recherche client)&nbsp;</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>âœ“ IX_Status (pour filtrage)&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>" id="li99m8f6pBMgpOQs9aNq-19"> <mxCell vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-80" y="730" width="410" height="290" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <UserObject label="<div style="text-align: justify;">Custom Object: Order__c&nbsp;</div><div OrderNumber__c</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ Amount__c&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ Status__c (En prÃ©paration, ExpÃ©diÃ©, LivrÃ©)&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ CreatedDate&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><br></div><div style="text-align: justify;">Synchronisation:&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ Job automatique toutes les heures</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ RÃ©cupÃ¨re TOUTES les commandes modifiÃ©es&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ Push vers Azure SQL&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><br></div><div style="text-align: justify;">Authentification:&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ OAuth2 (Connected App)&nbsp;</div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>â€¢ Token rafraÃ®chi
